Description: A text that appears on screen when the player is standing close to a security door, proposing to the player that they hack a security lock, while also warning for an alarm connected to the door.

French.Translation: Pirater le verrou de sécurité <color=red>[ALERTE : ALARME DÉTECTÉE]</color>

Italian.Translation: Forza serratura di sicurezza <color=red>[ATTENZIONE: ALLARME RILEVATO]</color>

Spanish.Translation: Hackear cerradura de seguridad <color=red>[AVIS: ALARMA DETECTADA]</color>

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Hackeie a trava de segurança <color=red>[AVISO: ALARME DETECTADO]</color>

Japanese.Translation: セキュリティロック <color=red>をハッキングしろ[警告:警報を検知]</color>

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 破解安全鎖<color=red>[警告：偵測到警報]</color>

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 侵入安全锁<color=red>[警告：探测到警报器]</color>

name: InGame.InteractionPrompt.SecurityDoor.HackSecurityLock
